description:
Get 20% off DeleteMe US consumer plans when you go to http://joindeleteme.com/LinusTechTips  and use promo code LTT at checkout.
DeleteMe International Plans: https://international.joindeleteme.com/

Check out the MSI MPG 491CQP QD-OLED at https://lmg.gg/C042H

It's not an OLED, but it is pretty unique. This Sun Vision Display brings what they call rLCD, a whole new tech that we need to reflect on for a second. So is the solution any good? Like Blue light defeating good? Well, only one way to find out!

Discuss on the forum:https://linustechtips.com/topic/1567378-how-could-the-brightest-monitor-have-no-backlight-sun-vision-re-rlcd-display/

title: How Could the Brightest Monitor Have NO Backlight? - Sun Vision rE rLCD Display
